forumNotes.author: friske
forumNotes.content:
I would to wake up from Windows without to rewrite hibernate.sys.

As far as I could read, the wake up only works when you suspend the system and not when shutdown.

I tryed EWF but not work in Win7 x64.

Is not there some way to SetWakeUpTime without SetSuspendState but setting only S4 start and shutdown normally to restart without read hibernate.sys?
